DOC.brief_summary: This study design characterize pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic effect fospropofol disodium comparison propofol . In addition , study compare maximum sedative effect , safety tolerability fospropofol disodium propofol .
DOC.brief_title: A PK/PD Study Fospropofol Disodium Compared With Propofol Injectable Emulsion
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Males female great equal 18 less equal 45 year old Nonsmokers least 18 month prior Screening Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less equal 30 Exclusion Subjects past current medical history respiratory illness include asthma Subjects currently take medication ( birth control allow subject take least 12 week prior dose entire study ) , include overthecounter ( OTC ) medication , within 14 day Screening Subjects know suspected history drug alcohol misuse within 6 month prior Screening , positive urine drug test Screening predose Visit 2 Visit 3 Subjectw allergic egg , egg product , soybean , soy product Subjects positive pregnancy test Screening breastfeed Subjects unwilling unable abide requirement study Subjects condition would make him/her , opinion investigator , unsuitable study , opinion investigator , likely complete study reason
